definitions.definition: (with on or upon or (that + ordinary verb form)) To hold up a claim emphatically.
definitions.example: I insist that my secretary dresses nicely.

definitions.definition: (sometimes with on or upon or (that + subjunctive)) To demand continually that something happen or be done.
definitions.example: I insist that my secretary dress nicely.

definitions.definition: To stand (on); to rest (upon); to lean (upon).
